attributes.action: Hold a Public Enquiry into the running of Haringey's Child Protection Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The failure of Haringey Councils Child Protection Services have led to the death of a young child (Baby P) This child was repeatedly seen by Haringey Social Services who failed to take positive action and prevent this childs death.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
